alert.note: Alert for Custer Co Plains; Jackson; Oglala Lakota; Pennington Co Plains; Southern Meade Co Plains (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 03 at 10:53PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of south central Meade, northeastern Custer, northeastern Oglala Lakota, northwestern Jackson and southeastern Pennington Counties through 1145 PM MDT... At 1053 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Thompson Butte to 2 miles northwest of Scenic to 9 miles east of Badlands National Park. Movement was northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Northeastern Badlands National Park around 1110 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include New Underwood, Owanka, Pinnacles Ranger Station, Wicksville, Wasta, Viewfield, Delta 9 Missile Silo, Wall, Quinn and Curlew Lake. This includes Interstate 90 in South Dakota between Mile Markers 70 and 127. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 200 AM MDT for southwestern and west central South Dakota.

area.areaDesc: Custer Co Plains; Jackson; Oglala Lakota; Pennington Co Plains; Southern Meade Co Plains
